data: There are a few days in our autumnal season—very few and rare!—when we draw the curtain against the glare of the sun at breakfast, and yet in the evening are glad to gather around the cheerful glow of the fire.

There are a few days in our autumnal season--very few and rare!--when we draw the curtain against the glare of the sun at breakfast, and yet in the evening are glad to gather around the cheerful glow of the fire.
Lever, Charles James, 1806-1872; Browne, Hablot Knight, 1815-1882 [Illustrator]
